title: This Damn Marriage - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day
author: 달콤J
description:
A married couple divorcing in their 7th year is the only way they can think of to live! 

Ji-seok, who married a woman from a chaebol family, became vice president at the Geumyoung Department Store.

I believed that I would be happy with love alone, but now it is difficult to endure the ignorance of Do-hee and the pressure from her family, who would growl by only looking at my face. 

“If you want to divorce, do it.”

It was Do-hee, who said this upon his request for divorce, but will she really wash it away like this? 
Why did she suddenly approaching him as if seducing when she already said that?

With the indiscriminate temptation of the breathtaking, and fascinating Do-hee, will Ji-seok succeed in divorcing safely?>
